plain: Based on the user's favorite books, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is probably literature, their favorite kind of plot is probably character-driven, their favorite setting is probably historical, their favorite writing style is probably descriptive, their favorite length is probably novel-length, their favorite topic is probably social commentary, their favorite pacing is probably slow-burn, their favorite narrative structure is probably third-person omniscient, and their favorite themes are probably morality and social justice.
